chat.message: consults/referrals: this is more of a general comment as no one will usually be consulted until investigations are back. are these plans something we go back to and update or just for the initial bolus of orders?

chat.title: Pain management meds?
chat.message: Working in a remote location, we would have to transfer patients out for CT, etc. I would add some pain management orders to this set, unless there is a separate area that we can add pain meds? (i.e. Tylenol, Advil, Morphine, Ketorolac)

I would also be curious why LFTs aren't in the bloodwork options as well as
antinauseants and pain management
I assume we can revisit and update the order sets multiple times.
